event.title: Richard Stallman gives a talk about "Copyright vs. Community" in Munich

body.p: On July 11, Richard Stallman gives a talk talk about "Copyright vs. Community" at Campus Garching, Munich. Focus of this talk will be threats deriving from actual copyright law on scientific publishing. The event will take place in the "Rudolf-Diesel HÃ¶rsal MW 2001" of Campus Garching and starts at 6 PM.
